name: Alpine Energy
overview: Alpine Energy Limited, along with its subsidiaries, owns and operates the electricity distribution network in South Canterbury, New Zealand. It provides services in the areas of new connection application, connecting to the network, distributed generation, and load management, as well as safety measures regarding overhead lines, lines down, electrical work at home, and tree requirements adjacent to electricity lines. The company also offers line construction, land development, asset management substation and distribution, technical and industrial electrical services, as well as design, construction, and maintenance of electrical management and supply. In addition, it provides overhead, underground, and earthing services to distribution lines companies, industries, and consumers. Alpine Energy Limited was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Timaru, New Zealand.

funding_round.source_description: Brammo Grabs $28 Million From Polaris And Others To Power Development Of Electric Vehicles
